text: Wayne Sevier (July 3, 1941 – October 2, 1999) was an American football coach. He served as an assistant coach for the San Diego Chargers, Washington Redskins, Los Angeles Rams and St. Louis Rams. He died of a heart attack on October 2, 1999, in San Diego, California at age 58. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:1999 deaths Category:San Diego State Aztecs football players Category:San Diego Chargers coaches Category:Washington Redskins coaches Category:Los Angeles Rams coaches Category:St. Louis Rams coaches
title: Wayne Sevier
